channel.title: The Pudding
channel.description: The Pudding is an editorial publication that explains ideas debated in culture with visual essays.

item.description: The best visual and data-driven stories of 2019

item.description: Using advanced NBA stats to rank player performance against pay.

item.description: Investigating when big hair was at its height.

item.description: Exploring the usage, evolution, and perception of digital laughter.

item.description: Measuring the data behind a promise to transform prosecution.

item.title: Where Do Adoptable Dogs in Your State Come From?
item.description: It may be further than you think.

item.description: Finding the shortest route between UK pubs of the same name.

item.description: An investigation into the mutability of slang.

item.description: How does popular media see our generation?

item.title: Are Men Singing Higher in Pop Music?
item.description: Men’s voices in pop music seem really high. When was vocal register the highest?

item.description: How one unethical study on vaccines caused irreparable harm.

item.description: A journey through every Billboard top 5 hit to find music’s greatest era
